alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 20 at 7:59PM CDT until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. Pearl River near Lena affecting Leake County. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. Pearl River Near Ratliff`s Ferry affecting Rankin and Madison Counties. Pearl River At Jackson affecting Rankin and Hinds Counties. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River At Jackson. * WHEN...From Thursday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 30.0 feet, Water backs up into several creeks and streams in the Jackson area. Water is under some homes near the river in the Byram area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 22.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Thursday evening and continue rising to a crest of 30.5 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Pearl River Jackson 28.0 22.5 Tue 7 pm CDT 25.3 27.8 29.6 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 900 AM CDT.
